basics.name: Senior Supply Sergeant
basics.label: Logistics Professional
basics.summary: To obtain a position in the logistics arena as an Inventory Management Specialist, Logistics Management Specialist, Supply Management Specialist, or Senior Logistics Analyst within any organization in which my experience, knowledge, and skills will be used accordingly.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Knowledgeable of Army Supply Regulations, Processes, Principles, Procedures, and Concepts of Logistics Management. Responsible for processing, analyzing and reviewing equipment fielding documents. Managed equipment readiness, retrograde and redistribution. Maintained records for lost, destroyed and stolen property and coordinated the execution of more than $5 million in Government Contracts.
highlights: Reviewed and corrected budget estimates and proposals
Trained Leaders and Subordinates on Logistics and Supply Operations

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised and managed all logistical operations. Monitored and ensured that unit followed Command and Supply Discipline Program within the guidelines of the Army Regulations. Conducted required inspections with units to ensure proper standards. Provided services to units ensuring that required needs were met.
highlights: Identified strengths and weaknesses, provided alternative actions

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised Army Force Generation (ARFORGEN) Reset Operations. Provided material supply maintenance support and ensured proper disposal procedures while disposing of excess property. Managed and coordinated the movement of Department of the Army stock and loaned equipment.
highlights: Provided technical guidance in Supply Chain Management

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as the Brigade Property Book Supervisor, processed and resolved unit level property accounting issues. Coordinated logistical support for training. Managed the excess program and handled the administration of property book records.
highlights: Directed and handled the administration of property book records
